text: was a Japanese nuclear physicist and politician. He was known for his works in the interacting boson model. Arima was born in Osaka, Japan. He was a member of the House of Councillors between 1998 to 2004. He was a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. Arima died on December 7, 2020 in Tokyo at the age of 90.有馬朗人氏死去 元東大学長・文相、90歳 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Japanese physicists Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:People from Osaka
title: Akito Arima
